naraka dosthara kenek wenawata wada honda kondosthara kenek wena eka nambukara deyak bawa mahacharya nandadasa kodagoda mahatha prakasha kara athi bawa saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasayi.mahacharya nandadasa kodagoda mahathage putha wana nithipathi departhamenthuwe solisitar janaral yasantha kodagoda mahatha thama piyage me katha puwatha puwathpathakata kiya athi bawa thama puwathpathakin dutuwe yayi da amathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.simawasika waidyawaru 830 denakuta pathwim pradanaya kirime uthsawayata sahabhagi wemin amathiwaraya me bawa bandaranayaka anusmarana jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawe di pereda (28 da) prakasha kaleya.amathiwaraya ehidi meseda kiya sitiyeya.

pohoya wadasatahanata sahabhagi wana pinwathunata uposatha shilaya rakimata awashya danamanadi pahasukam atamasthanadhipathi nahimige anushasana paridi pannipitiya, makumbaura padinchi, di.ee. hettiaarachchi mahatha wisin salasa denu labe.kolambaa, kuppiyawaththa shri jayashekhararama wiharasthanaye purapasaloswaka poho da wadasatahan mese ya.perawaru 6.00 ‚Äì 6.30 ta uposatha shilaya ha keti anushasanawa kotte janadhipathi widyalaye aacharya shri jayashekhararamadhikari rajawaththe wappahimi, 7.00 ‚Äì 7.30 dakwa sambuddha pujawa meheyawima thalalle sirimahinda nahimi 8.00 ‚Äì 9.00 bhawana wadasatahana wiharadhikari rajawaththe wappa himi, 9.15 ‚Äì 10.15 dakwa dharma deshanaya rajawaththe wappa himi, 10.30 ‚Äì 11.00 ta dawal sambuddha pujawa thalalle siri mahinda himi 12.15 ‚Äì 12.30 ta buddhanussathi bhawana wiharastha upasaka upasika samithiya, 2.15 ‚Äì 3.15 ta dharma deshanaya maligawaththe sudharmaramadhipathi godauda ariyadhamma na himi, 3.30 ‚Äì 4.30 dakwa bhawanawa thalalle siri mahinda nahimi, 4.30 ‚Äì 5.30 ta dharma deshanaya, jayashekhararamawasi, keselpotha sumanawansha himi, paswaru 6.00 ta sil pawaranaya, thalalle sirimahinda nahimi, 6.45 ‚Äì 7.45 dakwa sambuddha pujawa ha atawisi buddha pujawa, 8.00 ‚Äì 9.00 rathri dharma deshanaya (patigatha karana lada)pun poho da wadasatahan wistharaya mese ya.perawaru 6.30 sita 7.30 dakwa uposatha ashtanga silaya samadan karawima, keti anushasanawa saha maithri bhawanawa sidu kirima, dharmayathanadhipathi na himi, 7.30 sita 8.00 dakwa danaya pirinamima punyawekshawa haputhale ranasuddhi himi, 8.00 sita 9.00 dakwa bhawana wadasatahana wandurambaa nyanaloka himi, 9.00 sita 10.00 dakwa janadhipathi madure sita wikashanaya wana dharma deshanawa, perawaru 10.30 sita paswaru 12.00 dakwa dawal sambuddha pujawa, dahampahala nyanasudhira himi, paswaru 1.00 sita swarnawahiniye wikashaya wana amadahara kawi bana wadasatahana.
